Title: Limited Edition Cartier Tank Solo Small Stainless Steel Orange Strap Watch 31x24
Description: Limited Edition Cartier Tank Solo Small Stainless Steel Orange Strap Watch 31x24 Limited Edition Cartier Tank Solo Small Stainless Steel Orange Strap Watch 31x24MM REF#2716 Genuine pre-owned Limited Edition Cartier Small Tank Solo in Stainless Steel. The case is a rectangle shape measuring 31mm x 24mm and has a battery quartz movement. It has a rare vibrant orange dial with Cartier "CC" logo pattern. Black roman numerals at 12, 3, 6 and 9 and blue sword-shaped hands. Genuine shimmer-matt orange leather strap measuring 17.5mm on Cartier stainless steel single adjustable deployment buckle. Durable scratch resistant sapphire crystal, orange cabochon on crown. The watch has been fully serviced, runs great and in excellent condition. One year warranty Does not come with original box or papers Asking $2,200.00...Please feel free to make an offer!
